name: Night Of The Living Fandumb
description:
How long can you survive against BTS ARMYs?  Click to play Kpopalypse’s sp00ky interactive Halloween fanfiction!

WARNING: g0ry and sp00ky, also probably tRiGgErInG

For more content and k-pop related fun times visit www.kpopalypse.com

If you like this fanfiction consider supporting Kpopalypse on Patreon
